dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 985 IH: To amend the Agriculture Improvement Act of 2018 to reauthorize the dairy business innovation initiatives.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Van Orden (for himself and Mr. Carbajal) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Agriculture

form.official-title: To amend the Agriculture Improvement Act of 2018 to reauthorize the dairy business innovation initiatives.

section.text: Section 12513 of the Agriculture Improvement Act of 2018 (7 U.S.C. 1632d) is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: in subsection (b), by striking 3 and inserting 4;
in subsection (g)(1)(A), by striking 3 and inserting 4; and
in subsection (i), by striking $20,000,000 and inserting $36,000,000.
